properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 3:43AM CST until February 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet with occasional seas up to 8 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Port Mansfield to the Rio Grande
out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield
out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds 15 to 20 knots.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST MONDAY
